description: MLForge is a production-grade Machine Learning & MLOps framework for building, training, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML systems end-to-end.

UniML, as the name suggests, is a unified command-line interface(CLI)  system made for training, testing and deploying multiple machine learning models across various domains.  etc in a diverse framework emphasizing on reproducibility and cross-modal integration.
Distributed service framework using asynchronous messages supporting IoT, Machine Learning and Video
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.

A real-time Security Operations Center (SOC) infrastructure powered by AI and Kafka. Features a multi-stage pipeline for collecting system logs, detecting anomalies using machine learning, and mapping threats to the MITRE ATT&CK framework. Built to detect Hydra brute-force, Nmap scans, and Web fuzzing
Photonic Quantum Machine Learning Framework

Credit card fraud is a broad word for theft and fraud perpetrated using or utilizing a credit card at the  moment of payment. As the number of scammers grows every day. Credit cards are used for fraudulent  transactions, and there are several sorts of fraud.
A machine learning framework for urban wellness prediction using adaptive domain-aware random forests to achieve cross-city performance optimization across six major Chinese cities.
Interpretable, physics-guided machine learning framework for Curie temperature prediction and inverse design of spintronic materials.
Machine learning framework to assess climate-driven risk of Salmonella contamination in poultry using lagged meteorological variables (France case study)
Code repository for 'Machine Learning based framework for Drone Detection and Identification using RF signals'
Machine learning, computer vision, statistics and general scientific computing for .NET
An uncertainty-aware evaluation framework for healthcare machine learning, focusing on risk-aware decision support beyond accuracy or
An All-in-One Algo-Trading Framework: Backtest -> Train -> Trade -> Monitor. Machine / Deep Learning Ready. Supports All Trading: TradFi+CeFi+DeFi. Code Once, Trade Anywhere.

MOA is an open source framework for Big Data stream mining. It includes a collection of machine learning algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, outlier detection, concept drift detection and recommender systems) and tools for evaluation.
TAK-ML - A machine learning framework for use with the TAK ecosystem (specifically ATAK and TAK Server at the moment)
An end-to-end Responsible AI framework for auditing machine learning models for bias, fairness violations, ethical risk, explainability, and data leakage using industry-standard metrics.

SIGMA (Smart Intelligent Grid Management Architecture) .SIGMA is an AI framework designed to bring intelligence, resilience, and automation to modern power grids. This project integrates simulation data, machine learning models, and realtime monitoring pipelines to detect, classify, and respond to faults across multiple layers of the grid.
This is a five-step framework for the development of intrusion detection systems (IDS) using machine learning (ML) considering model realization, and performance evaluation.

The project addresses these concerns by developing a framework for bias detection and mitigation, primarily through data preprocessing. Traditional preprocessing techniques often  favor majority classes while discarding minority instances, leading to skewed model behavior.
This framework extends DEA by training ensemble machine learning models to predict DEA efficiency scores, enabling scalable, forward-looking efficiency analysis.
Self Preservation Eval project for the Advance Machine Learning course, using the Inspect AI framework for the evaluation of LLMs
Machine learning evaluation frameworks

Bioinformatics and Machine Learning framework for in silico prediction of candidiasis-related microRNAs. Includes data processing, feature engineering, and ML models for miRNA-disease association prediction.
A network automation framework for Cisco iOS device splitting and monitoring with an integrated machine learning algorithm
Predict traffic accident severity using advanced machine learning and explainable AI, enhancing road safety with clear insights from comprehensive data analysis.

An AI-driven monitoring dashboard combining Machine Learning models and an AI agent to analyze sensor data, identify anomalies, and provide actionable recommendations. Backend powered by Django REST Framework, frontend built with React + Vite.

A factor-based machine learning framework utilizing Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and Random Forest Classification to extract structural alpha and predict directional movement in the Indian Banking Sector (NSE)
Machine learning framework for strain-level prediction
LNN4ACP is a novel stacked framework that integrates both machine learning and deep learning components for accurate ACP identification and virtual generation.

An AI-driven adaptive honeypot framework that dynamically deceives attackers, analyzes behavior using machine learning and reinforcement learning, and generates actionable threat intelligence mapped to the MITRE ATT&CK framework.
A data-driven framework for customer segmentation and early-risk prediction using transactional data, RFM analysis, and machine learning. This repository supports an academic research study.

Retrieve text data from company websites for classification. These steps collectively contribute to a comprehensive framework for classifying companies based on the content of their websites, incorporating web scraping, NLP, machine learning, and visualization techniques.

Machine learning framework for predicting financial market crashes by combining GARCH volatility models with Extreme Value Theory. Trained on 2008 financial crisis data, achieves 73.5% accuracy detecting tail events during COVID-19 crash. Features custom risk model implementations and interpretable ML pipeline.
Python framework for building robust tabular machine learning model faster and easier.
A Machine Learning framework for early performance prediction and design space exploration in computer architecture simulations (ChampSim).
Audit AI models for fairness and explainability with VeritasAI, the ethical framework for responsible machine learning training and evaluation.
A comprehensive collection of machine learning algorithms and deep learning models implemented from scratch and using modern frameworks.

Alert Prioritization System using Learning-to-Rank (RankNet, LambdaRank, LambdaMART) A machine learningbased alert ranking framework that prioritizes network intrusion alerts using CIC-IDS 2017 data and LightGBM learning-to-rank algorithms, simulating real-world SOC alert triage.

An open-source dataset of synthetic power quality disturbances (PQD), ideal for training and validating machine learning models. Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Includes a Python analysis framework for statistical exploration.
Framework for Measuring and Optimizing Algorithmic Fairness  in Machine Learning Models

Machine learning and single-cell transcriptomic analysis framework for characterizing platelet subpopulations in COVID-19, Sepsis, and SLE, revealing novel prognostic biomarkers and therapeutic targets.

Modular backtesting framework for algorithmic trading using Backtrader. Features a 4-phase state machine strategy, JPY pair P&L correction (ERIS logic), and professional reporting. Educational resource for learning systematic trading.
In Silico Prediction of Shelf-Life for Marinated Meat Products Using an Integrative Framework of Machine Learning and Text Mining

A Java-based LLM Agent framework using an explicit state machine with planning-first, tool-driven execution, structured observations, and robust error handling. Designed for controllability, observability, and production-ready Agent experiments.

This repository provides a comprehensive framework for enhancing nuclear Density Functional Theory (DRHBc) predictions through physics-informed machine learning. Our approach combines -learning with domain-specific feature engineering to significantly improve the accuracy of nuclear binding energies, charge radii, and separation energy predictions

Onboarding documentation source for the AMD Ryzen AI Software Platform.   The AMD Ryzen AI Software Platform enables developers to take pretrained machine learning models in popular frameworks and run them on laptops powered by AMD Ryzen AI technology.
An open-source framework for machine learning and other computations on decentralized data.

This project focuses on predicting the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD) using a multi-modal machine learning framework. The dataset integrates demographic, lifestyle, psychological, and physiological features. Several models were developed and compared, including Random Forest, XGBoost, Support Vector Classifier (SVC).
dgbpy is a framework for research and deployment of machine learning models from seismic and well data.

A machine learningbased antenna design framework that predicts return loss (S11) from geometric parameters using an ensemble regressor. A genetic algorithm is used to optimize antenna dimensions across 5.56.5 GHz, reducing reliance on repeated EM simulations.
Hybrid ensemble machine learning framework for telecom customer churn prediction with class imbalance handling (SMOTE-ENN) and CLV-based feature engineering.
A Framework for Developing Robust Machine Learning Models in Harsh Environments
Framework de Machine Learning Escalable para la Vigilancia Epidemiolgica del Dengue en Colombia - Sistema de Alerta Temprana de Dengue para Cali usando XGBoost y GitHub Actions.

This project focuses on customer behavior analysis using the RFMT framework combined with machine learning techniques. It segments customers into meaningful groups to help organizations optimize marketing strategies and enhance customer relationships.

In competitive industries like telecoms, retaining customers is as vital as gaining them. Using real-world data, this churn research project analyzes why users leave and how to stop it. By leveraging machine learning and predictive modeling, I translate data into business strategies, creating a framework to maintain an engaged, loyal customer base.
Equitrain: A Unified Framework for Training and Fine-tuning Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials

A comprehensive, production-ready framework for time series forecasting in financial markets. This project demonstrates modern machine learning techniques for predicting stock prices and evaluating trading strategies with realistic backtesting.

A neural network that analyzes a toy data set of heights and weights, mapping them to genders. This was done without the help of machine learning frameworks to deeply understand how a neural network learns.

Machine learning project focused on optimizing global freight carrier selection across Air, Sea, and Inland transportation modes. The solution predicts shipment costs and service quality using synthetic historical data and ranks carriers through a multi-objective optimization framework balancing price and customer experience.

Framework  for comprehensive variant detection in whole genome sequences using advanced machine learning models for cross domain pattern recognition in fitness, pharmacogenetics and nutritional aspects of sprint running

This repository provides a framework for predicting soil moisture using hydroclimate variables and machine-learning models. It integrates gridded reanalysis data with baseline and physics-informed approaches to evaluate soil-moisture variability, drought persistence, and landsurface predictability over the Colorado River Basin.

The Extreme Gradient Boosting (XGB) model exhibited the best predictive performance on the testing set.  In this work, we proposed a machine learning framework to predict the f values of ABO4-type ceramics.

This repository implements an end-to-end machine learning framework for mental health data analysis, including preprocessing, regression, classification, and clustering. Random Forest models achieve superior predictive performance, while PCA and K-Means reveal hidden patterns to support data-driven mental health insights.
Cost-aware option hedging using a two-stage machine learning control framework
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software.
A curated list of awesome agentic machine learning projects, frameworks, and resources.

A long-form article and practical framework for designing machine learning systems that warn instead of decide. Covers regimes vs decimals, levers over labels, reversible alerts, anti-coercion UI patterns, auditability, and the Warning Card template, so ML preserves human agency while staying useful under uncertainty.
An Adaptive Multi-Layered Extraction-Resistant Framework Against Model Extraction Attacks in Cloud-Based Machine Learning
This project develops a predictive framework for credit risk under IFRS 9 standards. It leverages a dataset of over 32,500 entries to predict the Probability of Default (PD).

Atlas DataFlow  um framework contrato-driven para construo de pipelines analticos modulares, auditveis e adaptveis. Organiza o fluxo de dados em etapas orientadas a domnio, promovendo rastreabilidade, reprodutibilidade e integrao consistente entre anlise de dados, modelagem estatstica e aplicaes de machine learning.
A versatile local LLM framework for chat, image, video, machine learning modelling, speech, and automation
Machine Learning Frameworks in Rust
A machine learning framework for binary classification and feature importance analysis on demographic datasets.

A machine learningbased malware detection framework was developed to classify benign and malicious executables. Selected discriminative features were used to train multiple classifiers. Evaluation using accuracy and ROCAUC shows that ensemble models achieve superior detection performance.
A pure Rust implementation of TensorFlow, providing a full-featured machine learning framework with Rust's safety and performance.
Machine learning framework for real-time cancer risk prediction with adaptive self-training feedback.
ML.NET is an open source and cross-platform machine learning framework for .NET.

P2P lending platforms require effective credit risk assessment to balance default risk against expected returns. Using ~410,000 historical loans from Bondora (2009-2024), this analysis develops a machine learning framework to predict loan defaults and optimize portfolio capital allocation strategies for investors operating under limited capital.

AI vs. Human Text Detection Framework A machine learning benchmarking system designed to distinguish between AI-generated and human-written text in Bengali and English. It utilizes novel graph-based feature extraction, rigorous statistical validation, and multi-model benchmarking against state-of-the-art baselines like DetectGPT and Grover.
This Repo contains Machine Learning and Deep Learning projects implemented using scikit-learn,Tensorflow,Pytorch and  pure numpy to demonstrate framework-based and from-scratch implementations.
A modular machine learning framework for budget execution & data analysis built in Python with Scikit, XGBoost, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.

A machine learning framework for cloud resource forecasting using time-series algorithms (Random Forest, SVM, Informer, SCINet). Includes interactive Streamlit dashboard for visualizing CPU/memory predictions on real workload traces (Alibaba 2018, Google 2019). Optimize capacity planning and reduce cloud costs.

A novel machine learning framework integrating Grey Wolf Optimizer and XGBoost with constrained feature selection for enhanced Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) screening in children, emphasizing interpretability, efficiency, and suitability for resource-constrained environments.
A quantitative data-science framework to understand and predict cross-market risk contagion across global financial markets using causal inference and machine learning techniques.
Developing an automated credit risk management framework, integrating high-performance machine learning and an algorithmic bias control mechanism.

A curated list of awesome frameworks, libraries, tools, and resources for Artificial Intelligence (AI). This list covers everything from foundational machine learning and deep learning to specialized areas like NLP, computer vision, and AI ethics.
A generalized hybrid machine learning and optimization framework for market return prediction under risk constraints.
This repository presents AuDaCE (Audio Dataset Controlled Environment), a framework aiming at simplifying the management of machine learning datasets based on audio.

design and develop a robust, efficient, and scalable hybrid security framework that integrates Machine Learning (ML) and Cryptosystem techniques to protect cloud-stored data from various security threats, ensuring confidentiality, integrity, and availability
Node.js bindings for [MLX](https://github.com/ml-explore/mlx) - Apple's array framework for machine learning on Apple Silicon.

A full-stack heart disease prediction web app built using Django REST Framework, React, and Machine Learning. It uses Logistic Regression to predict heart disease based on medical inputs. The app features a responsive UI, REST APIs, and real-time predictions.
untuk belajar tentang machine learning menggunakan framework fastapi dan dengan menerapkan algoritma regresi linier
This repository contains the supplementary materials for the paper: Machine Learning Framework for Speech Intelligibility Prediction using Binaural Room Impulse Responses (Alfian et al., 2026)
A machine learning framework for predicting exchange current density (I0) and interpreting molecular descriptors, utilizing scikit-learn, NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, and SHAP.

This project is a comprehensive cybersecurity solution that focuses on detecting phishing websites and analyzing DDoS attacks through simulation. It combines Machine Learning, Real-Time Web Application Monitoring, and Load Balancerbased attack simulation to create an end-to-end security framework.
